definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)

sentences.english: Planate unit price per m. t. for aluminum ingot.
We recycle about 96,000 metric tons of plastic annually.
sentences.chinese: 我们每年可回收约96，000公吨的塑料。

sentences.english: Can you make us a special offer based on a quantity of 5000M/T?
sentences.chinese: 以5000公吨的数量为基础，贵公司能给特价吗？

sentences.english: Decommissioning of the underground diesel oil tanks with a total storage capacity exceeding 200 tonnes.
sentences.chinese: 解除总贮存量逾200公吨的地下柴油油缸的运作。

sentences.english: As a fuel, lignin is worth around $44 a metric ton.
sentences.chinese: 当做燃料的木素，价值约为每公吨44美元。

sentences.english: Your price is $500/mt, twice of the other countries.
sentences.chinese: 你们的价格是每公吨500美元，为其他国家的两倍。

sentences.english: We make a counter-offer to you of $150 per metric ton F. O. B. London.
sentences.chinese: 开茶叶我们讨价为每公吨伦敦离岸价150美元。

sentences.english: It produces 5m tonnes of coking coal a year.
sentences.chinese: 每年，这个煤矿都会产出5百万公吨的焦煤。

sentences.english: Your price is$500/mt! twice of the other countries.
sentences.chinese: 你们每公吨500美圆的价钱是另番邦度的两倍。

sentences.english: Last year Euro-Scrap sold around one and half million metric tons into the Turkish market.
sentences.chinese: 去年欧洲废料出售约一个半百万公吨进入土耳其市场。

sentences.english: More than 4,000 tonnes of roses are harvested to make cosmetic products in this region.
sentences.chinese: 这个区域有超过4千公吨的玫瑰被采下来制造化妆品。

sentences.english: This would bring available production capacity back to 46, 000 metric tons at these three facilities.
sentences.chinese: 此举将把可用生产能力恢复到46000公吨。

sentences.english: Trucks with gasoline engine, g. v. w. exceeding 5 tonnes.
sentences.chinese: 货车，装有汽油引擎，总重量超过5公吨者。

sentences.english: Litterbugs dro ed 159 to es of ru ish during last year's Mid-Autumn Festival.
sentences.chinese: 垃圾虫在去年中秋节后遗下159公吨垃圾。

sentences.english: We make a counter-offer to you of $150 per metric ton F.O.B. London.
sentences.chinese: 我们还价为每公吨伦敦离岸价150美圆。

sentences.english: An adult elephant weighs around six tons.
sentences.chinese: 一只成年大象重约六公吨。
